Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class ApplicationBase

    Simulator application implementation. This is singleton class as only single instance per simulation game is allowed! It implementes all interfaces needed for app to run. Maintains the player, landscape and actions state; Should Control time of simulation(needs refactoring, now game class fiddles with that logic?).

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    ApplicationBase
    Namespace: CommonInterfaces
    Assembly: CommonInterfaces.dll
    Syntax
    public abstract class ApplicationBase : object, IReadOnlyApplication, ILog
